verse: भजन्त्यभजतो ये वै करुणा: पितरौ यथा ।धर्मो निरपवादोऽत्र सौहृदं च सुमध्यमा: ॥ १८ ॥

synonyms.abhajataḥ: with those who do not reciprocate with them

translation: My dear slender-waisted gopīs, some people are genuinely merciful or, like parents, naturally affectionate. Such persons, who devotedly serve even those who fail to reciprocate with them, are following the true, faultless path of religion, and they are true well-wishers.
